fields.name: BenefitId
fields.description: Benefit id the benefit utilization summaries report is for. Required for benefit id scope. Not supported for benefit order or any billing scopes.

fields.name: BenefitOrderId
fields.description: Benefit order id the benefit utilization summaries report is for. Required for benefit order and benefit id scopes. Not supported for any billing scopes.

fields.name: BillingAccountId
fields.description: Billing account the benefit utilization summaries report is for. Required for billing account and billing profile scopes. Not supported for any benefit scopes.

fields.name: BillingProfileId
fields.description: Billing profile id the benefit utilization summaries report is for. Required for billing profile scope. Not supported for billing account or any benefit scopes.

fields.name: EndDate
fields.description: The end date of the summaries data that will be served in the report.

fields.name: Grain
fields.description: The grain the summaries data is served at in the report. Accepted values are 'Daily' or 'Monthly'.

fields.name: Kind
fields.description: The type of benefit data requested. Required for billing account and billing profile scopes. Implied and not to be passed at benefit scopes. Supported values are Reservation and SavingsPlan

fields.name: StartDate
fields.description: The start date of the summaries data that will be served in the report.
